1.content:
You run down the narrow hallway but it never seems to end. You see a light at the end but you can't seem to reach it. Suddenly the walls melt away and you come to the realization that you're dreaming. You've, quite literally, walked into a lucid dream.

Hello, Human, the voice echos around you.

"Who are you?" you call out.

I am no one, the voice tells you. Your mind intrigues me, Human. I have decided to give you a gift.

"A gift?" you ask.

Indeed, Human. I have decided to give you the power to control the world around you, to manipulate the very fabric of reality.

"What's the catch?"

No catch. I just want to see what you will do. Farewell, Human. It is time for you to wake.

You open your eyes to see the ceiling of your room above you. You reach over to your nightstand and pick up your phone to check the time. It's 7 in the morning... on a Monday. "Aw man," you grumble. "I slept in again... at least that stupid dream woke me up so I won't be late for school. But I wonder... No there's no way that could be real."

You stare at the ceiling and imagine it being green instead of white. To your surprise the color begins to change. You bolt upright. "Holy crap!" you shout. "I did not think that would work!"

You quickly jump out of bed as ideas flood your mind. Screw school! You can do anything you want! The question still remains, however: what should you do?
1.title: The Dream

choices: Make a big, sweeping change to reality
Use your powers to fight crime
Call up a friend and tell them about your power
11.content:
"I could go to school," you say to yourself. "But... nah!" School is a thing of the past for you. You can alter the very fabric of reality to suit your desires. Any knowledge you need from school, you can just make yourself know it. You can become a superhero or a literal god! You can satisfy all your fantasies or just fuck with people. There are so many possibilities.

"What to do... what to do," you say. You look around the room, thoughts racing through your mind. You have so many ideas, but where do you want to begin?
11.title: Screw school

111.content:
Part of you can't resist the urge to mess with your younger sister, Ashlie. You were always up for a good prank at her expense since she could be an annoying brat sometimes. With your new powers there were all sorts of possibilities. A clever idea pops into your mind as you decide what exactly to do. You decide to make yourself into a genie to find out Ashlie's deepest desires and then grant them, with a twist, of course!

Your first order of business is to make it so that people will be unaware of your presence, at least for the time being. Next, you create a duplicate of yourself to make sure nothing seems amiss. You make this duplicate just a normal you, without powers or knowledge of them at all. This Matt will just carry on your normal life as if nothing special had happened last night. With that out of the way, it's time to transform yourself into a genie!

Your appearance needs to change, so that you look like a genie and not like yourself. First, you give yourself a stereotypical genie outfit with the poofy pants, the turban, and the no shirt look. You then make yourself a bit more buff looking, give yourself green skin, and change your face to look very different from your own. You change the facial structure, give yourself glowing yellow eyes, and then add a goatee for good measure.

"Nice," you say to yourself in your normal voice. That needs to change, you think. You alter the sound of your voice to be deeper and make it so you have a bit of an accent. As a final touch, you give it a booming reverb effect to sound cool.

"That should do it," you say with your new voice. "Now we need a lamp." You conjure up a stereotypical-looking genie lap and connect yourself to it, transforming your legs into the wispy end of a genie the emerges from the lamp as you had seen in various cartoons and such.

You then float yourself to Ashlie's room, where you find her sleeping. You make yourself perceptible only to her, then float over her bed. You then retreat into your lamp drop it out of the air, landing right on top of her.

"Ow!" your sister yells out. She sits up and looks around. "What the heck?" she asks. Her eyes fall on the lamp and she picks it up. "Where did this come from." She gets out of bed and takes another look around. "Matt, did you throw this at me?" she calls out. No response comes.

Technically, I did, you think. If you had a corporeal form at the moment, you would be laughing.

Your sister takes another look at the lamp, brushing it with her fingers. "What is this thing anyway?" she asks.

You decide that's good enough, and spring forth from the lamp! "I have been released!" you declare in your booming new voice. Ashlie drops the lamp and hops back in surprise. "Be careful," you tell her.

"Oh, uh, sorry," she says, still a bit shocked. After a moment, she calms down and asks, "so, who are you supposed to be?"

Shit, I didn't think of a name, you realize. "I am Wehttam, Genie of the Lamp," you say. What a stupid name.

"Whettam? like Matthew backwards? Is this some prank of Matt's?"

"Do I look like a prank?" you ask her. You need to save this. "My name is Weh'taam. W-E-H-Apostrophe-T-A-A-M. I am the genie of this lamp. Since you have released me, my master, I shall grant you ..."
111.title: Weh'taam, Genie of the Lamp

choices: "I'm going to need some time to think about it."
"I know what I want to wish for."
1111.content:
"Only one?" Ashlie asks you. "Aren't genies supposed to grant three wishes?"

"Don't get pushy, girl," you warn your sister, folding your arms. "You only get one, so think carefully. And, before you ask, no, you can't wish for more wishes. You only get the one."

"Hmm," Ashlie says, deep in thought. After a few minutes she says ...

"Yeah, exactly," Ashlie says. "This is a really big decision."

"Well, I shall be here until you are ready," you tell her.

"What are you just gonna follow me around until I make my wish?" she asks you.

"Indeed," you say. "But worry not, no one else can see me but you."

"Good," Ashlie says. "Because I need to go to school now and I don't know how I would explain this."

"School, huh?" you say. "How exciting."

"Yeah," Ashlie replies rather sarcastically. "Exciting."

With a loud sigh, she proceeds to leave the room. You follow behind her and watch as she and your own body operating on autopilot get in the car with your older sister Amanda. At this point you have a choice to make. You can follow Ashlie through school as Weh'Taam, or you can let Weh'Taam operate on autopilot until your sister makes her wish and instead return to your own body or just fly off and do something else to pass the time.

Decisions, decisions, you think.

Deciding you have better things to do than follow your sister around at school, you leave Whe'Taam on autopilot much like your own body. You use your control of reality to set things up such that you will automatically return to "piloting" the genie if Ashlie is about to make her wish or if she has anything important to say, then you fly off as an incorporeal ball of light to find some other way of amusing yourself.

You soon find yourself downtown, floating above the many pedestrians going about their business. They are totally unaware of your presence for now. As you gaze down at the unsuspecting people, you think about what you want to do.
111111.title: You decide to fly off and do something else

1111111.content:
Still floating as an unseen ball of light, you think it might be more fun to follow around one person instead of causing some mischief on a large scale involving all the people you see. There's just something far more intimate about the idea that appeals to you. You can mess around with them, and maybe even reveal yourself, roping one of these people into being an unwilling 'accomplice' to your shenanigans. Besides, you are still getting used to your reality manipulation powers and you don't want to cause irreparable damage to the fabric of reality or something like that.

Let's see here, you think as you float down to street level to get a better look at everyone.

There are many people around, but a few in particular catch your attention. There's an attractive blonde woman in her late 20s or early 30s dressed in a stylish skirt and blouse combo and a pair of black high heeled boots, a college aged guy dressed in jeans and a t-shirt with long shaggy hair that looks like he's in a rock band, and a punky looking girl in her late teens or early 20s with dyed green hair wearing skinny jeans and a grungy looking top.

There are other interesting people around, of course, but these three are the first to jump out at you as potential 'victims.' You give it a bit of thought, mentally weighing your options to determine who will be the most interesting person to follow and the most fun to mess with. Eventually, you make up your mind and decide to follow ___.

This will be fun, you think as you begin floating toward your selection.
1111111.title: You pick out one person to follow

Just go along with it and avoid the hassle
11111111.content:
You decided to follow the blonde woman. You floated after her as a ball of light, still unnoticed by the world around you. As you floated after her, you wanted to learn more about her, so you decided to conjure up a list of stats above her head, like she was an NPC in a videogame. These stats were only visible to you, obviously, and you learned that her name was Sarah. Sarah was a timid, twenty-nine year old, and she was aspiring to be a public defender at a local aw firm. Despite the passion and ambition Matt sensed, her shyness caused her not to really put herself out there.

You followed along after Sarah as she trundled along the street, slinging her purse over her shoulder again whilst she precariously balanced a stack of files. She made her way to her favourite cafe for her morning coffee and, as she arrived at the cafe and joined the queue, you attuned yourself to her thoughts. As you did so, you could hear her mind at work, and some of her thoughts were pretty out there. You smiled (in a noncorporeal sense) as one particularly interesting thought caught your attention.

’Everything here is so expensive,’ she thought as her eyes robotically scanned the menu. ”Why can’t people go back to just trading for favours...” she sighed under her breath as the barista passed along her cup. Sarah Fisher around in her pocket for change but the barista smiled and shook her head. “You know what? It’s on the house, sweetcheeks...”

“Thank you, thank you so much! I don’t even think I had enough to-...”

“...But, you have to do something in return for ME.” Sarah’s lips pursed warily as the employee pointed downwards towards the front of her apron. Through the tight fabric Sarah could see a petite bulge forming, growing and expanding until a mighty beast snuggled itself in the brown material. Sarah’s eyes bulged- how the hell had the barista gotten one of those?! ’Maybe she’s trans and I just didn’t notice,” Sarah thought but she knew that the woman hadn’t had... one of those things before. Even if she was a transsexual this didn’t explain the fact that this was blatant sexual harassment and all the other people in the line thought nothing of it.

“You could either help me relieve myself, or I could charge you DOUBLE on this overpriced crap for wasting my time. If you STILL don’t pay... Well, I hope you’re fast enough to run from security in those heels. What’s it gonna be?”

A bead of sweat trickled down from Sarah’s scalp onto her cute blouse. The woman had backed her into a corner and she knew it. One side of her mind told her that the woman was bluffing but she doubted that. The other side had begun looking for the nearest points of exit in order to make a quick getaway. Weirdly though, a small sliver of her mind was curious about this predicament and wondered if doing this was really that bad... No! She repressed that thought. No time to crave sex. Looking into the barista’s smug grin, Sarah decided to...
11111111.title: the blonde woman

choices: Listen to Lilly's thoughts and make them real.
Ashlie is ready to make her wish.
11111113.content:
You decided to follow the punk girl. You floated after her as a ball of light, still unnoticed by the world around you. As you floated after her, you wanted to learn more about her, so you decided to conjure up a list of stats above her head, like she was an NPC in a videogame. These stats were only visible to you, obviously, and you learned that her name was Lilly. Lilly was twenty-one, and she was part of a band she had formed with her friends. Perhaps unsurprisingly, she was the band's drummer.

You followed along after Lilly as she made her way to her favourite cafe for her morning coffee. As she arrived at the cafe and joined the queue, you attuned yourself to her thoughts. As you did so, you could hear her mind at work, and some of her thoughts were pretty out there. One particularly interesting thought caught your attention.

Wouldn't it be crazy if the coffees here were served with breast milk? Lilly thought, then shook her head at the silliness of the idea.

You laughed, thinking it was pretty crazy. That was why you decided to do exactly that. The shirts of all the staff members disappeared, and their breasts grew until they were about an E-cup. Even the men now had E-cup boobs, and you tweaked them all so that they had no chest hair. After all, getting chest hair in your coffee would be gross. After giving all of the cafe's staff such big assets, you decided to get them to put those assets to work. The baristas continued to make the coffees as normal, but now, when they needed to add milk, they would hold the cup to one of their boobs and gently squeeze, causing breast milk to flow from their nipples into the cup. Once the breast milk had been added, the baristas would then finish the coffees as normal, then serve them to the customers.

As the baristas began adding their breast milk to the coffees they were making, nobody so much as batted an eyelid... except for Lilly. You had decided to make her aware of the changes you'd made to the cafe, though she was still unaware of your presence. Lilly's eyes were wide with shock, and her jaw was hanging open. She shook her head, and rubbed her eyes.

I must be dreaming, she thought, then pinched herself.

"Ow," she muttered, then looked back up at the baristas making coffee with their breast milk. Okay, not dreaming.

Lilly's surprise soon changed into curiosity, as she began to wonder how exactly this had happened.

Did... did I somehow do this...? Lilly thought.

Lilly was brought out of her musings as she got to the front of the queue, and had to make her order. You floated behind her, unseen, as she ordered a large latte, and watched as the barista massaged his breast to add the milk to the coffee. Lilly then took her coffee and sat down, her mind racing.

After I had that crazy idea, the baristas suddenly started using breast milk in their coffees, Lilly thought as she took a sip of her coffee. Oh, this tastes really good. Breast coffee is best coffee.

Lilly snickered at her own little joke, and you laughed along with her. Not that she noticed you, of course.

But seriously, how is this possible? Lilly thought. Do I have the power to alter reality?

Well, she didn't, but you did. A few ideas now came to mind. You could reveal yourself to Lilly, and make her an accomplice in your reality warping adventures. Or you might simply follow her around, listening to her thoughts and making them a reality. Or maybe your sister Ashlie was ready to make her wish with Weh'Taam. Or you could move on to something or someone else...
11111113.title: The punk girl, Lilly.

choices: Lilly wants more time to think.
111111131.content:
Before you do anything, you decided to check in on your two other selves. Thankfully, they were both in the same place, making things much easier. Your older sister Amanda had just parked the car, and the powerless clone living your life was getting out of his seat. Meanwhile, Ashlie had stuffed the lamp that contained Weh'taam the genie inside her bag, and was hurrying off.

Since nothing interesting was happening to either of them, you returned your attention to the young woman in front of you. Lilly still seemed to be in shock. That wasn't surprising, since she'd just received a coffee made with breast milk. A man's breast milk, at that, since the barista that had served her had been a male.

Hesitantly, Lilly brought her cup to her lips and had another sip. To her surprise, the breast milk coffee tasted much better than she ever thought it would. Setting her cup down, she looked around the cafe again. Nobody seemed shocked that all the cafe's staff had their tits out on display, or that even the men had E-cup boobs. And not a single person had said that there was anything strange about the fact that the coffees were made with human breast milk.

I don't get it, Lilly thought, taking another sip of her breast milk coffee. The whole cafe changed after I thought about making coffees with breast milk. Was that... was that me? Did I do that?

No, actually, it was me, you said telepathically, allowing Lilly to hear your voice. Hello, Lilly.

"Wha...?" said Lilly, looking around. "Who?"

I am in your mind, Lilly, you thought. When you think, I will hear it. As for who and what I am, the answer to those questions are the same. I am a god.

"Huh?!" Lilly said out loud, as her eyes nearly popped out of her head. You're... God?!

No, I am not the God, you thought. I am merely a god, though I do possess vast powers. What you saw earlier was proof of that.

"You mean..." Lilly began. ...The whole breast milk coffee thing? That was you?

Yes... and no, you thought. You were the one who came up with the idea. I simply made it a reality.

"Okay, but why?" said Lilly. And why me?

Because I found you, and your ideas, intriguing, you thought. That is why I have chosen to reveal myself to you. I also have an offer for you.

An offer? Lilly thought, raising an eyebrow. What kind of offer?

For twenty-four hours, I will alter the fabric of reality to your design, you thought. Whatever you desire can be yours... within reason, of course.

Lilly sighed. Of course there's a catch. What can't you do?

I can do anything, you thought. However, there are a few things I will not do. I will not kill people or erase them from existence, and I will not grant you permanent access to my full powers. A small sliver, perhaps, but not the full package. I will also not do anything that brings harm to myself, either directly or indirectly.

You thought these terms were fairly reasonable. You knew that you probably could erase people from existence, but you weren't sure how badly that might screw up history if you did so. After all, the butterfly effect could be a real bitch. You also didn't want to accidentally create someone who could become a potential rival, or worse, a threat.

"I see," Lilly said, nodding slowly as she thought. And if I say no?

Then I will leave you be, and no harm will come to you, you thought.

And what you did to this place? Lilly thought.

Can be undone, if that is truly what you wish, you thought. But I suspect you'd like to see this stay.

"Well... uh... um..." Lilly stammered, blushing profusely. You're... er... well, you're not wrong.

You chuckled. Anyway, that is my offer. What is your decision?

Lilly took another sip of breast milk coffee as she thought over your offer. Eventually, Lilly spoke up.
111111131.title: Reveal yourself to Lilly.

12.content:
"I should go to school, shouldn't I?" you ask yourself. You realize you could use your new powers to make it so that you don't have to go, but you figure school is a good a place as any to test them out.

As your first order of business, you will yourself to be clean, dressed, and ready for your day. Even thought you know it'll work, you still feel incredibly excited when you find yourself fully dressed and looking presentable. "This is so awesome!" you shout, a stupid grin plastered on your face.

You then step out of your room and almost walk right into your younger sister Ashlie as she runs past.

"Hey! Watch where you're going!" she shouts at you as she steps around you. She continues running down the hall toward the stairs. "And, hurry up or Amanda will leave without you again!" she shouts back at you.

You sigh and follow your sister downstairs and out the front door to join your older sister Amanda in the car. You quickly get in and Amanda pulls the car out. Ever since she got her license, Amanda had been given the job of driving you, Ashlie, and herself to school. Of course, being the overachiever that she is, Amanda gladly accepted the responsibility. At least now that Ashlie is a freshman, you no longer need to stop at the middle school on the way to the high school, so you haven't been late for school as much this year.

You sigh once more once you realize that you didn't get the chance to grab breakfast. Then it occurs to you that you have a power that can take care of that real quick! You will a nice, toasted bagel with cream cheese to appear in your hands and, just as expected, it arrives, perfectly warm, cream cheese spread to perfection. You quickly bring it up to your mouth and take a bite.

"When did you have enough time to make that?" Amanda asks you, noticing the bagel in your hand when she turns her head to check for incoming traffic in the intersection. You realize that your powers seem to alter reality to accept changes by default, probably to keep you from unintentionally causing a panic. You figure that you could probably make everyone, or even a select few, aware of the changes if you really wanted to.

"Magic," you tell your sister, mouth full of food.

"You know I have no idea what you just said, right?" Amanda asks you with a laugh. You ignore her and continue to eat your breakfast.

Once you finish, you begin to wonder if you should try out your powers on the way to school...
12.title: Go To School

122.content:
You were sitting in the front passenger seat while your older sister Amanda was driving and your younger sister Ashlie was in the back. Amanda had put on her own CD and although you didn't like it, you had other things on your mind. Amanda was going to drop you and Ashlie off at your high school, where Ashlie was a freshman and you were a junior and then head out to her own college classes.

Looking outside you saw a woman pushing her baby in a stroller. The little one was content with just watching the world go by as he sucked upon his pacifier. It was at this moment when Amanda decided to ask you a question.

You weren't paying attention and so she talked a little louder. You were so angry than you magically placed a pacifier in your sister's mouth. It had a ribbon attached that tied in the back making it impossible for Amanda to spit it out. Despite the pacifier, Amanda continued to drive as she had been. Since Amanda provoked you into changing her first, you decided to change Amanda some more.

The next thing you did was to replace Amanda's panties with a thick disposable diaper. The diaper fit her perfectly even though it was designed for a toddler (including a Disney princess design) and was closed with tabs. Amanda didn't notice the change. To her she had always worn diapers, just like she always had her paccie in her mouth while driving to keep her from getting distracted. Over the diaper, you decided she should wear plastic panties which had a vinyl outer layer and a soft absorbent inner layer. The seat adjusted height to make up for the additional padding on Amanda's rear.

You finally swapped all of Amanda's clothing, including her bra and shoes and replaced them with a fleece footie jumpsuit with a front zipper that allowed for easy changes. The jumpsuit was pink with an allover polka dot print and an applique princess monkey on the right side. None of these changes effected, Amanda's driving in any way.

“Yes!” you said quietly, pumping your fist in victory. You’d managed to turn back time two days! Since you’d already lived through these two days, you knew what your family was going to do. Your family didn’t have any plans for the weekend, so they were just going to stay home and relax, although Ashlie would want to go to the mall tomorrow, so you’d have to drive her there. Other than that, you had no commitments. You could do whatever you wanted... literally, thanks to your new powers. And since you were up one hour earlier than normal, you could mess with your family while they were still asleep. But why stop there? You could use your powers to change the entire world, if you wanted to. Or, you could simply use your powers to alter yourself somehow.
1552.title: Don't bother with school. You've got a ...

choices: Turn the world into a sci-fi/fantasy world.
Alter the whole world in some other way.
15522.content: As you considered what to do with your powers, an idea struck you. You were something of a closet geek, with an interest in fantasy and science fiction. You’d never really told anyone before, but these powers gave you an idea. Maybe you could use these powers of yours to turn the world into something straight out of a fantasy or sci-fi story.
15522.title: Use your powers to alter the whole world.

155221.content: The more you thought about it, the more you liked the idea. The only question was, would you go for a science fiction world, or for a fantasy world?
155221.title: Turn the world into a sci-fi/fantasy world.

1553.content: Before you get a chance to make up your mind, one of your family members barges into the room. Who is it?
1553.title: Interrupted

choices: Use your powers to do something else entirely
15533.content:
Suddenly, your younger brother Matt bursts into your room, startling you. "Damn it, Matt!" you shout in surprise. "What did I tell you about barging in like that?!"

"Sorry," he apologizes. "But we're gonna be late if you don't hurry up. It's not like you to sleep in. That's my job."

You let out a slight laugh. It seems that the weird dream that granted you your new power had also caused you to sleep in. Usually, you drove yourself and your siblings to school since both your parents had to leave for work early in the morning. The three of you are all in high school now, so it's a pretty convenient arrangement ... when everyone gets ready on time that is. It is very rarely your fault because you are responsible and your siblings depend on you.

"Don't worry," you say. "I'll get us there on time."

You're about to tell Matt to get out of your room so you can get ready, but then you feel the urge to use your new powers. You consider using them on your brother or even telling him about them. What do you do?
15533.title: Your younger brother Matt

info.brief_description: What would you do if you were granted the power to manipulate the world around you?
info.description:
You are Matt Lawson, just your average high school student. One day you are granted the power to manipulate reality, a power some might consider too dangerous too be granted to a human. But you don't really care about that, you just want to use your new found power to have some fun! There are also options to start as one of Matt's sisters instead!

This story stands on its own, but it is also the fourth part in a series of loosely related interactive stories that share the same universe.

I know this is yet another concept that is done to death, but I felt like putting my own spin on it so here we are. The powers are pretty straightforward, you can pretty much alter the world as you see fit. But, as always, I have a few guidelines.

Please try not to have too many "choice" chapters where you are given more options. Try to keep the story going.
No abrupt endings. Endings are fine, but you have to lead up to them.
Try to have good spelling and grammar if you can, and maintain 2nd person and present tense for consistency's sake. I will make small edits if necessary, but if your chapter is a mess I will delete it
And of course, have fun. This is a pretty open-ended story so other than these rules, go wild!

Here are a few characters to get you started:
Matt Lawson: You. You're an average 16 year-old guy. You have short, dark hair and brown eyes, and have an average build and height of 5'9". You enjoy sports, but you were never very good at them. You like video games and hard rock music. You're a smart guy, but you're kind of lazy and don't apply yourself so you're just an average student.

Amanda Lawson: Your 18 year-old sister. She's the opposite of you. She's smart, she's pretty, she's popular, and is a member of a ton of extracurricular activities. She's the kind of sociable person that can get along with anyone. You get along well but don't really share any interests so you don't hang out a lot. She has long, brown hair and brown eyes, and a great figure. She stands at 5'4" and has a pair of C-cup breasts.

Ashlie Lawson: Your 14 year-old sister. She's hyperactive and annoying. You don't dislike her, but you don't like spending time with her either because she's so obnoxious. She has brown eyes and long, dark hair, but its currently dyed bright pink. As she's still growing, she's only 5'1" and her breasts are only an A-cup. She's pretty much the stereotypical scene girl in terms of style, and she has the same sort of interests as well, listening to emo pop-punk and post-hardcore bands and enjoying stuff like Twilight.

Wendy and Paul Lawson: Your parents. They're pretty average parents in their early 40s. Your dad has slightly graying dark hair and your mother has shoulder-length brown hair like your older sister. Your dad is a dentist and your mom is a lawyer.

Zoe: The Lawson family dog. She's a 2 year-old chocolate lab with relatively high energy.

I leave the rest of the characters up to you! Feel free to add whatever friends, enemies, extended relatives, or whoever else to your story branch. I only ask that you don't add anymore immediate family members and that you maintain the continuity in each story branch (basically if a character exists in one branch they don't necessarily exist in another and vice versa).
